text: 14.22 Mat 7.14, Apo 11.23, 15.32, 18.23, 1 Te 3.3 Amɨlɨg, binɨb ned Jisas takaw agel nɨgɨlak okok, kɨlop tepayaŋ ak agñɨtep gɨlɨg agɨlek, Jisas takaw ak ma kelɨgɨnɨmɨb, nop gos lɨnepɨm tek nep nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨlek. Anɨgem, nɨbop mɨŋel ñɨnɨgabal ak pen, tap anɨb ak gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨlek. God chɨnop dɨl kod mɨdɨl man ne alaŋ dad amnɨgab agɨl, kɨles gɨl gem amnɨmuŋ agɨlek.
